TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeechRecognizer extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 為 Windows 桌面上共用的語音辨識服務提供存取。

span.span: Provides access to the shared speech recognition service available on the Windows desktop.

span.span: The current location in the speech recognizer's audio input stream through which it has received input.

summary.span: 在同步語音辨識中使用文字而不使用音訊，模擬對共用語音辨識器的輸入。

span.span: Emulates input to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些方法會略過系統音訊輸入。These methods bypass the system audio input. 當您正在測試或偵錯的應用程式或文法，這可以是很有幫助。This can be helpful when you are testing or debugging an application or grammar. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Windows 語音辨識處於**睡眠**狀態，則這些方法會傳回`null`。If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then these methods return `null`. 共用辨識器會引發， ， ，和事件彷彿未模擬辨識作業。The shared recognizer raises the , , , and events as if the recognition operation is not emulated. 辨識器會忽略新行和額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. > [!NOTE] > 共用辨識器，以模擬輸入的回應所產生的物件具有值`null`針對其屬性。The object generated by the shared recognizer in response to emulated input has a value of `null` for its property. 若要模擬非同步辨識，使用方法。To emulate asynchronous recognition, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult EmulateRecognize(string inputText) cil managed
Public Function EmulateRecognize (inputText As String) As RecognitionResult

span.span: The input for the recognition operation.

summary.span: 在共用的語音辨識器上模擬片語輸入，針對同步的語音辨識使用文字而不使用音訊。

span.span: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.

returns.span: 辨識作業的辨識結果，如果作業不成功或 Windows 語音辨識處於 [睡眠] 狀態則為 。

span.span: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or , if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult EmulateRecognize(class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit[] wordUnits, valuetype System.Globalization.CompareOptions compareOptions) cil managed

param.name: wordUnits
param.span: 文字單位陣列，包含辨識作業的輸入。

span.span: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.

param.name: compareOptions
param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，描述要用於模擬辨識作業的比較類型。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.

summary.span: 在共用的語音辨識器上模擬特定單字輸入，針對同步的語音辨識使用文字而不使用音訊，並指定辨識器如何處理單字間的 Unicode 比較以及已載入的語音辨識文法。

span.span: Emulates input of specific words to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.

returns.span: 辨識作業的辨識結果，如果作業不成功或 Windows 語音辨識處於 [睡眠] 狀態則為 。

span.span: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or , if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立物件使用所提供的資訊`wordUnits`參數。This method creates a object using the information provided in the `wordUnits` parameter. 辨識器使用`compareOptions`當它適用於文法規則進行剖析的輸入片語。The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase. Vista 和 Windows 7 隨附的辨識器忽略大小寫，如果或值。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 辨識器一律忽略字元寬度，並永遠不會忽略假名類型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 辨識器也會忽略新行，以及額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 如需有關字元寬度] 和 [假名類型的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult EmulateRecognize(string inputText, valuetype System.Globalization.CompareOptions compareOptions) cil managed

span.span: The input phrase for the recognition operation.

param.name: compareOptions
param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，描述要用於模擬辨識作業的比較類型。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.

summary.span: 在共用的語音辨識器上模擬片語輸入，針對同步的語音辨識使用文字而不使用音訊，並指定辨識器如何處理片語間的 Unicode 比較以及已載入的語音辨識文法。

span.span: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.

returns.span: 辨識作業的辨識結果，如果作業不成功或 Windows 語音辨識處於 [睡眠] 狀態則為 。

span.span: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or , if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辨識器使用`compareOptions`當它適用於文法規則進行剖析的輸入片語。The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase. Vista 和 Windows 7 隨附的辨識器忽略大小寫，如果或值。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 辨識器一律忽略字元寬度，並永遠不會忽略假名類型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 辨識器也會忽略新行，以及額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 如需有關字元寬度] 和 [假名類型的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

summary.span: 在非同步語音辨識中使用文字而不使用音訊，模擬對共用語音辨識器的輸入。

span.span: Emulates input to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些方法會略過系統音訊輸入。These methods bypass the system audio input. 當您正在測試或偵錯的應用程式或文法，這可以是很有幫助。This can be helpful when you are testing or debugging an application or grammar. 共用辨識器會引發， ， ，和事件彷彿未模擬辨識作業。The shared recognizer raises the , , , and events as if the recognition operation is not emulated. 當辨識器完成非同步辨識作業時，會引發事件。When the recognizer completes the asynchronous recognition operation, it raises the event. 辨識器會忽略新行和額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Windows 語音辨識處於**睡眠**狀態，則共用辨識器不會處理輸入，並不會引發和相關的事件，但仍會引發事件。If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then the shared recognizer does not process input and does not raise the and related events, but still raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 共用辨識器，以模擬輸入的回應所產生的物件具有值`null`針對其屬性。The object generated by the shared recognizer in response to emulated input has a value of `null` for its property. 若要模擬同步辨識，使用方法。To emulate synchronous recognition, use the method.

Vista 和 Windows 7 隨附的辨識器忽略大小寫，如果或值。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 辨識器一律忽略字元寬度，並永遠不會忽略假名類型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 辨識器也會忽略新行，以及額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 如需有關字元寬度] 和 [假名類型的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

Vista 和 Windows 7 隨附的辨識器忽略大小寫，如果或值。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 辨識器一律忽略字元寬度，並永遠不會忽略假名類型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 辨識器也會忽略新行，以及額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 如需有關字元寬度] 和 [假名類型的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

summary.span: 共用辨識器針對模擬輸入完成非同步辨識作業時發生。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示這個 物件是否準備好可以處理語音。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this object is ready to process speech.

value.span: 如果這個 物件正在執行語音辨識則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this object is performing speech recognition; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的變更不會影響其他執行個體會類別。Changes to this property do not affect other instances of the class. 根據預設，windows 7屬性是`true`的新具現化執行個體。By default, the value of the property is `true` for a newly instantiated instance of . 辨識器已停用時，辨識器的語音辨識文法中沒有任何可辨識作業。While the recognizer is disabled, none of the recognizer's speech recognition grammars are available for recognition operations. 設定辨識器屬性沒有任何影響，在辨識器上的屬性。Setting the recognizer's property has no effect on the recognizer's property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Grammars As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Grammar)

summary.span: 取得在這個 執行個體中載入之 物件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the objects that are loaded in this instance.

value.span: 物件的集合，應用程式會將這些物件載入共用的辨識器的目前執行個體中。

span.span: A collection of the objects that the application loaded into the current instance of the shared recognizer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadGrammar(class System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar grammar) cil managed

param.name: grammar
param.span: 要載入的語音辨識文法。

span.span: The speech recognition grammar to load.

summary.span: 載入語音辨識文法。

span.span: Loads a speech recognition grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadGrammarAsync(class System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar grammar) cil managed

param.name: grammar
param.span: 要載入的語音辨識文法。

span.span: The speech recognition grammar to load.

summary.span: 以非同步方式載入語音辨識文法。

span.span: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當辨識器完成這個非同步作業時，會引發事件。When the recognizer completes this asynchronous operation, it raises a event. 如果已載入，以非同步方式載入時，或無法載入任何辨識器的語音辨識文法的辨識器，則會擲回例外狀況。The recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer. 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。If the recognizer is running, applications must use to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar. 若要以同步方式載入語音辨識文法，請使用方法。To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event LoadGrammarCompleted As EventHandler(Of LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在辨識器完成語音辨識文法的非同步載入時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer finishes the asynchronous loading of a speech recognition grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxAlternates { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxAlternates : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定共用辨識器為每個辨識作業傳回之替代辨識結果的最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the shared recognizer returns for each recognition operation.

value.span: 語音辨識器為每個辨識作業傳回之替代結果的最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of alternate results that the speech recognizer returns for each recognition operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的屬性類別包含的集合代表輸入的其他候選解譯的物件。The property of the class contains the collection of objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the input. 預設值為為 10。The default value for is 10.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PauseRecognizerOnRecognition { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示當應用程式正在處理 事件時，共用辨識器是否會暫停辨識作業。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a event.

value.span: 如果共用辨識器會在有任何應用程式正在處理 事件時等候處理輸入則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the shared recognizer waits to process input while any application is handling the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`，如果內應用程式，就必須變更 語音辨識服務的狀態，或變更 語音辨識服務之前已載入或啟用語音辨識文法的事件處理常式多輸入的處理程序。Set this property to `true`, if within the event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性，以`true`會導致每個來封鎖 Windows speech recognition 服務的每個應用程式中的事件處理常式。Setting the property to `true` causes each event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service. 若要變更同步至共用辨識器您的應用程式狀態，請使用方法。To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the method. 當已`true`，在執行期間處理常式的語音辨識服務會暫停，並到達時，緩衝處理新的音訊輸入。When is `true`, during the execution of the handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives. 一次結束事件處理常式，語音辨識服務繼續辨識並開始處理從輸入緩衝區的資訊。Once the event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer. 若要啟用或停用語音辨識服務，請使用屬性。To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecognizerAudioPosition As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan RecognizerAudioPosition { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 取得辨識器正在處理的音訊輸入的目前位置。

span.span: Gets the current location of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.

value.span: 辨識器在其所處理之音訊輸入中的位置。

span.span: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RecognizerAudioPosition`屬性參考中處理其音訊輸入的辨識器的位置。The `RecognizerAudioPosition` property references the recognizer's position in processing its audio input. 相較之下，屬性會參考其產生的音訊資料流中的輸入的裝置的位置。By contrast, the property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream. 這些位置可能會不同。These positions can be different. 比方說，如果辨識器已收到輸入其已不但產生的值就辨識結果屬性是值小於屬性。For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the property is less than the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecognizerInfo As RecognizerInfo

summary.span: 取得共用語音辨識器的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets information about the shared speech recognizer.

value.span: 共用語音辨識器的相關資訊。

span.span: Information about the shared speech recognizer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event RecognizerUpdateReached As EventHandler(Of RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在辨識器暫停以同步處理辨識和其他作業時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer pauses to synchronize recognition and other operations.

summary.span: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestRecognizerUpdate() cil managed

summary.span: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當辨識器會產生事件，屬性是`null`。When the recognizer generates the event, the property of the is `null`. 若要提供的使用者語彙基元，請使用或方法。To provide a user token, use the or method. 若要指定的音訊位置的位移，請使用方法。To specify an audio position offset, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestRecognizerUpdate(object userToken) cil managed

param.name: userToken
param.span: 使用者定義的資訊，包含該作業的資訊。

span.span: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.

summary.span: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態，以及提供相關聯事件的使用者語彙基元。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當辨識器會產生事件，屬性包含的值`userToken`參數。When the recognizer generates the event, the property of the contains the value of the `userToken` parameter. 若要指定的音訊位置的位移，請使用方法。To specify an audio position offset, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RequestRecognizerUpdate (object userToken, TimeSpan audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate);
.method public hidebysig instance void RequestRecognizerUpdate(object userToken, valuetype System.TimeSpan audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate) cil managed
Public Sub RequestRecognizerUpdate (userToken As Object, audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate As TimeSpan)
public: void RequestRecognizerUpdate(System::Object ^ userToken, TimeSpan audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate);

param.name: userToken
param.span: 使用者定義的資訊，包含該作業的資訊。

span.span: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.

param.name: audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate
param.span: 從目前的 起將要求延遲的位移。

span.span: The offset from the current to delay the request.

summary.span: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態，以及提供相關聯事件的位移和使用者語彙基元。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辨識器，不會啟動在辨識器的更新要求辨識器直到等於目前再加上值`audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`參數。The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's equals the current plus the value of the `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter. 當辨識器會產生事件，屬性包含的值`userToken`參數。When the recognizer generates the event, the property of the contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SpeechDetected As EventHandler(Of SpeechDetectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 當辨識器偵測到可辨識為語音的輸入時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeechHypothesized As EventHandler(Of SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在辨識器已辨識的文字可能是文法中多個完整片語的元件時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SpeechRecognitionRejected As EventHandler(Of SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 當辨識器接收到不符合任何已載入的語音辨識文法的輸入時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that does not match any of the speech recognition grammars it has loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SpeechRecognized As EventHandler(Of SpeechRecognizedEventArgs)

summary.span: 當辨識器接收到符合其中一個語音辨識文法的輸入時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that matches one of its speech recognition grammars.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As RecognizerState

summary.span: 取得 物件的狀態。

span.span: Gets the state of a object.
The state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個唯讀屬性會指出共用辨識器停留在 Windows 中處於`Stopped`或`Listening`狀態。This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event StateChanged As EventHandler(Of StateChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 當 Windows 桌面語音技術辨識引擎的執行狀態變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadAllGrammars() cil managed

summary.span: 從共用辨識器卸載所有語音辨識文法。

span.span: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果辨識器正在以非同步方式載入文法，這個方法會等候直到載入文法之前它會卸載所有的辨識器的文法。If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars. 若要卸除特定的文法，請使用方法。To unload a specific grammar, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadGrammar(class System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar grammar) cil managed

span.span: The grammar to unload.

summary.span: 從共用辨識器卸載指定的語音辨識文法。

span.span: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。If the recognizer is running, applications must use to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar. 若要卸除所有文法，請使用方法。To unload all grammars, use the method.
